attributes.action: Don’t do summer school kids need a break and they need to spend time with family
attributes.additional_details: Don’t do summer school teachers and students have been working so hard over the lockdown so why should teachers be at school and not spending time with their families and students need to spend time with family also why should everyone suffer please  don’t start it.
attributes.background: We cant rollout the summer school of covid kids need to spend time with their family also teachers have been working hard everyday also teachers and students need a break away from school it is not fair so don’t let summer school start.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
